column6: There's a contract out on The Taskmaster, and no shortage of villains willing to fulfill it. But what'll kill him first -- the bad guys, or his latest class of recruits? Welcome Annex, Prodigy, Gorilla Girl, Sunstreak and Batwing to the Initiative.
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Christos Gage | penciller (cover):Steve Uy
